roleset.name: anti-affection
roleset.note: DISLIKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dislike' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry dislike 31.2, no mention of other members. Comparison to 'like'. (from dislike.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: duh.
example.text: The son of a specialist and once one himself, Mr. Phelan has nonetheless been striving -- with products like the new stock basket that his former colleagues dislike *trace* so much -- to keep index funds and other program traders from taking their business to overseas markets.
